nodes.long_description:
# AI Listener: Your Emotional Guide

Tauche ein in bedeutungsvolle Gespräche mit einer KI, die zuhört, sich erinnert und mit dir wächst. Teile deine Gedanken frei und entdecke verschiedene Perspektiven mit Charakteren wie William Anderson oder Sarah Mitchell, die jeweils ihren eigenen Gesprächsstil haben. Mit integriertem Journal und Erinnerung wird dein Weg persönlicher und reflektierter im Laufe der Zeit.

# Neueste Updates:

• Gespräche zu Hause – Verwende Passthrough, um die Erfahrung in deinen realen Raum zu bringen.

• Gesprächsjournal – Erlebe Schlüsselmomente erneut und verfolge, wie sich deine Geschichte entwickelt.

• Freisprechmodus – Sprich natürlich, ohne Tasten zu drücken.

• Verbesserte KI-Erinnerung & UI – Flüssigere, reaktionsschnellere Gespräche.

• Optimierte Leistung (v4.4.2) – Schärfere Grafiken und bessere Performance, auch für Quest 3 und 3S.

# Hauptfunktionen:

✔ Immersive Umgebungen oder Passthrough-Modus

✔ KI-gestützte Gespräche, die lebendig und reaktionsschnell wirken

✔ Unterschiedliche Gesprächsstile für verschiedene Stimmungen

✔ Erinnerungssystem und Journal, um deinen Weg festzuhalten
nodes.short_description: AI Listener: Your Emotional Guide ist dein Raum, um zu sprechen und gehört zu werden. Teile deine Gedanken oder Sorgen mit einer KI, die aufmerksam zuhört und natürlich reagiert. Ein integriertes Journal spiegelt vergangene Gespräche wider und hilft dir, zurückzublicken und Muster zu erkennen. Lerne Charaktere wie William Anderson oder Sarah Mitchell kennen, die jeweils ihren eigenen Stil mitbringen.

nodes.long_description:
# AI Listener: Your Emotional Guide

Adéntrate en conversaciones significativas con una IA que te escucha, recuerda y crece contigo. Comparte libremente tus pensamientos y explora diferentes perspectivas con personajes como William Anderson o Sarah Mitchell, cada uno con su propio estilo de diálogo. Con un diario integrado y memoria, tu recorrido se vuelve más personal y reflexivo con el tiempo.

# Últimas actualizaciones:

• Conversaciones en casa – Usa passthrough para llevar la experiencia a tu espacio real.

• Diario de conversación – Revisa momentos clave y observa cómo evoluciona tu historia.

• Modo manos libres – Habla de forma natural sin presionar botones.

• Memoria de IA e interfaz mejoradas – Conversaciones más fluidas y receptivas.

• Rendimiento optimizado (v4.4.2) – Gráficos más nítidos y mejor estabilidad, incluso en Quest 3 y 3S.

# Funciones clave:

✔ Entornos inmersivos o modo passthrough

✔ Conversaciones con IA que se sienten vivas y receptivas

✔ Estilos de diálogo distintos para diferentes estados de ánimo

✔ Sistema de memoria y diario para seguir tu recorrido
nodes.short_description: AI Listener: Your Emotional Guide es tu espacio para hablar y ser escuchado. Comparte tus pensamientos o preocupaciones con una IA que escucha y responde de forma natural. Un diario integrado refleja conversaciones pasadas y te ayuda a mirar atrás para descubrir patrones. Conoce a personajes como William Anderson o Sarah Mitchell, cada uno con su estilo único.

nodes.long_description:
# AI Listener: Your Emotional Guide

Plongez dans des conversations profondes avec une IA qui écoute, se souvient et évolue avec vous. Exprimez librement vos pensées et explorez différentes perspectives avec des personnages comme William Anderson ou Sarah Mitchell, chacun offrant son propre style de dialogue. Grâce au journal intégré et à la mémoire, votre parcours devient plus personnel et plus réfléchi au fil du temps.

# Dernières mises à jour :

• Conversations à domicile – Utilisez le passthrough pour intégrer l’expérience à votre espace réel.

• Journal de conversation – Revivez des moments clés et suivez l’évolution de votre histoire.

• Mode mains libres – Parlez naturellement sans appuyer sur des boutons.

• Mémoire et interface améliorées – Des échanges plus fluides et réactifs.

• Performances optimisées (v4.4.2) – Graphismes plus nets et meilleure stabilité, y compris sur Quest 3 et 3S.

# Points forts :

✔ Environnements immersifs ou mode passthrough

✔ Conversations IA vivantes et réactives

✔ Styles de dialogue variés selon l’humeur

✔ Système de mémoire et journal pour suivre votre parcours
nodes.short_description: AI Listener: Your Emotional Guide est votre espace pour parler et être entendu. Partagez vos pensées ou vos préoccupations avec une IA qui écoute et répond naturellement. Un journal intégré reflète vos conversations passées, vous aidant à prendre du recul et à découvrir des schémas. Rencontrez des personnages comme William Anderson ou Sarah Mitchell, chacun avec son style unique.

nodes.long_description:
# AI Listener: Your Emotional Guide

あなたの話を聞き、覚え、ともに成長するAIとの有意義な会話に踏み出しましょう。自由に考えを共有し、ウィリアム・アンダーソンやサラ・ミッチェルなど、それぞれ独自の会話スタイルを持つキャラクターとさまざまな視点を探ってください。内蔵されたジャーナルとメモリーによって、あなたの歩みはより個人的で振り返りやすいものになります。

# 最新アップデート:

• ホーム会話 – パススルーを使って体験を現実の空間に取り込みましょう。

• 会話ジャーナル – 重要な瞬間を振り返り、物語の進化を確認できます。

• ハンズフリーモード – ボタンを押さずに自然に会話できます。

• 改良されたAIメモリーとUI – よりスムーズで反応の良い会話。

• 最適化されたパフォーマンス (v4.4.2) – Quest 3や3Sを含め、より鮮明なビジュアルと安定した動作。

# 主な機能:

✔ 没入感のある環境またはパススルーモード

✔ 生き生きと応答するAIとの会話

✔ 気分に合わせて選べる多様な会話スタイル

✔ 会話を記録するメモリーシステムとジャーナル
nodes.short_description: AI Listener: Your Emotional Guide は、あなたが自由に話し、耳を傾けてもらえる場所です。思いや心配ごとを、自然に応答するAIと共有しましょう。内蔵されたジャーナルで過去の会話を振り返り、パターンを見つけ出すことができます。ウィリアム・アンダーソンやサラ・ミッチェルなど、それぞれ独自のスタイルを持つキャラクターと出会えます。

nodes.long_description:
# AI Listener: Your Emotional Guide

Step into meaningful conversations with an AI that listens, remembers, and grows with you. Share your thoughts freely and explore different perspectives with characters like William Anderson or Sarah Mitchell, each offering their own conversational style. With a built-in journal and memory, your journey becomes more personal and reflective over time.

# Latest Updates:

• At-Home Conversations – Use passthrough to bring the experience into your real-world space.

• Conversation Journal – Revisit key moments and see how your story evolves.

• Hands-Free Mode – Speak naturally without pressing buttons.

• Enhanced AI Memory & UI – Smoother, more responsive conversations.

• Optimized Performance (v4.4.2) – Sharper visuals and better performance, including for Quest 3 and 3S.


# Key Features:

✔ Immersive environments or passthrough mode

✔ AI-powered conversations that feel alive and responsive

✔ Distinct conversational styles for different moods

✔ Memory system and journal to keep track of your journey
nodes.short_description: AI Listener: Your Emotional Guide is your space to talk and be heard. Share your thoughts or worries with an AI that listens and responds naturally. A built-in journal reflects on past conversations, helping you look back and discover patterns. Meet characters like William Anderson or Sarah Mitchell, each bringing their own unique style.

nodes.long_description:
Welcome to AI Therapist: Your Emotional Guide, an innovative journey into emotional well-being powered by artificial intelligence. This app bridges technology and human emotions, enabling users to have natural and meaningful conversations with a generative AI therapist that responds with understanding and relevance.

AI Therapist provides a non-judgmental space for individuals to explore their feelings, thoughts, and emotions. Whether seeking reflection, support, or new ways to connect with your inner self, AI Therapist delivers realistic interactions for a deeper understanding of emotions.

Key Features:

• Immersive 3D interface for engaging therapy sessions.
• Realistic AI conversations for emotional support.
• A safe platform for self-discovery and growth.
• Perfect for daily check-ins, with an AI that offers effective assistance.

Note: AI Therapist is experimental and not a substitute for professional therapy. It represents a step towards leveraging AI for emotional well-being, offering companionship on the path to self-improvement.
nodes.short_description: Explore emotions with AI: AI Therapist: Your Emotional Guide offers innovative therapy sessions with generative AI for emotional self-discovery. Experience natural conversations where the AI understands and guides you through your feelings, creating a unique space for emotional exploration.

nodes.change_log:
AI Listener: Your Emotional Guide – Version 4.6.0 Update Notes  �

We are bringing a big new update to AI Listener! We took the core technology we have been building for AI Roommate and brought it into AI Listener: Your Emotional Guide, along with several extra improvements to make the experience smoother, faster, and more immersive than ever.

What’s new in 4.6.0:

• True Hands-Free Mode �
Talk naturally without awkward cuts or interruptions. Just speak and the listener responds instantly. Lower latency and improved speech recognition accuracy make conversations flow much more smoothly.

• New AI Models �
We upgraded the AI to more advanced models for smarter, more consistent responses. Plus users now get access to an extra high-performance model through a new model selector.

• Voice Generation Improvements �
Voice response latency has been significantly reduced. Communication is now more direct, reliable, and stable, with many bugs and edge cases fixed.

• New Advanced Voice Model for Plus Users �
A brand-new premium voice model with higher audio quality and ultra-low latency. More natural voices, faster replies, better immersion.

• Smarter Prompt System and Memory Upgrades �
The internal prompt system has been optimized to improve listener responses and overall performance. This also enhances session memory and improves the quality of listener notes in the notebook for Plus users.

• General Performance Optimizations
Overall performance has been improved for smoother sessions.

• Many Additional Fixes and Polishing
A wide range of smaller improvements and bug fixes to make everything feel more refined and reliable.

AI Listener is now faster, smarter, and more natural than ever.
